reply.text: Hola, what do you want to know of me?
I was born in Rodez (France) in 1082. I inherited the title of Count of Barcelona from my farther when I was just 14 years old.
When I was a young count I initially co-ruled with my uncle Berenguer Ramon I who unfortunately, died fighting in the First Crusade.
I studied at the Knights Templar and was buried dressed in the white robes of the order in the Monastery of Santa Mar√≠a de Ripoll.
